Index.title: RealTWNOG
Index.subtitle: Taiwan Network Operators Group
Index.description: Taiwan Network Operators Group community, dedicated to providing a platform for network interconnection cooperation and technical exchange.
Index.mission_text: RealTWNOG aims to promote technical exchanges and cooperation among Taiwan network operators, establishing an open and shared professional community to enhance the stability and security of network infrastructure.
Index.whatWeDo_item3: Best practices discussions for network infrastructure
Index.whatWeDo_item4: Exploration of latest network technologies and trends
